Articles.Content:
Hep tell me if you want the craft files of my ships.

Ill post my space station called Polarus as soon as i dock all the parts! (I use hyperedit because I am too pussy to build launchers)

Ill list my mods latter but most of my crafts are stock or B9 with KAS (the containers are pretty handy).

Hep tell me if you want the craft files of my ships.

Ill post my space station called Polarus as soon as i dock all the parts! (I use hyperedit because I am too pussy to build launchers)

Ill list my mods latter but most of my crafts are stock or B9 with KAS (the containers are pretty handy).

I agree the KAS containers are a must for any of my planetary bases.

Ok the mods I use are :

B9 aerospace

Quantum struts

Editor extensions

enhanced navball

firespitter

hexcans (KAS)

ion hybrid electric pack

KAS

hyperedit

kethane

kerbal dust experiments (I like sciences, make the game funnier in career but im using this part on my sciences modules too so you might want to install it)

mission controller

Tal's radial experiment storage container

docking port alignment

rendezme (for space planes to dock)

roomfarer lazor docking cam

rotation freeze

targetron

treeloader (kerbin is much prettier)

warp plugin (i'm only using their science)

There are 2 or 3 more unescessary plugins that makes my life easier.
Here's the first picture of Polarus I just screenshot :
Hey got time left so I built a custom version of SKYLAB
